title: Topic 004 Question 110
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains a container group named Group1. Group1 contains two Azure container instances as shown in the following table.
You need to ensure that container2 can use CPU resources without negatively affecting container1.
options: Increase the resource limit of container1 to three CPUs.
Increase the resource limit of container2 to six CPUs.
Remove the resource limit for both containers.
Decrease the resource limit of container2 to two CPUs.
